page.title: 03Education
page.content: Our School was built in 1835. We have one Teacher and a Headteacher. Our Headteacher is here only half the day because he runs two small schools,one over at Nertherton as well as here.At Harbottle we have 20 pupils full time and 2 pupils part time. STAFF. Headteacher Mr.Taylor since 1968 Assistant Teacher Mrs. Carr since 1971 Cook Mrs.E. Tait Cleaner Miss M.Scott Lunch Time Aux. Mrs. C.Scott Mrs. J. Kirk teaches the Nursery Class on Tuesday mornings. CHILDREN. 3_4yrs Nursery 4_9yrs First School 10_13 Middle School,Rothbury 13_16,17or18 High School Morpeth.
